summary: This bill, the Vicksburg National Military Park Boundary Modification Act, aims to modify the boundary of the Vicksburg National Military Park in Mississippi. It directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey two parcels of land (approximately 3.66 acres and 6.48 acres) within the park to the State of Mississippi for public use, such as a welcome center, interpretive center, or museum. Upon conveyance, the park's boundary will be adjusted to reflect the change.
